name: 162 Police in Action
overview: 162 Police are in action. As one of the 162 police officers you must rid the city of criminal gangs. Simply by shooting at them. Can you put an end to the big crime wave, and restore peace and justice back to the community? Your job is to protect and serve the public, after all. Developed by Roberto Ricioppo using the Shoot 'em Up Construction Kit in 2016.
